動物用藥品名稱: 衛保雞傳染性華氏囊病活毒疫苗  WEBSTERS BURSAVAC VACCINE
英文名稱: LIVE INFECTIOUS BURSAL DISEASE VAC(STRAIN V877)
業者名稱: 台灣惠氏股份有限公司
效能(適應症): 肉雞、蛋雞及種雞：預防雞之傳染性華氏囊炎的感染。
ingredients: NOT LESS THAN 10^3.0 EID50 OF IBD(L) VIRUS (STRAIN V877)OTHER INGREDIENT:SUCROSE...100.7MCG     SODIUM DIHYDROGEN ORTHOPHOSPHATE...0.7MCGPOTASSIUM HYDROGEN ORTHOPHOSPHATE...1.7MCGBOVINE SERUM ALBUMIN...13.5MCG    GENTAMICIN...0.1%V/VNYSTATIN...0.1%V/V
